properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Indro fa misoka izao
'Lay masoandro tazanao.
Manatona avia derao
Ny Mpamorona anao.
Ankalazao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Dera, haja, saotra.
Atolotray,
Ho Anao, Jehovah Ray.
Mendrika asandratray
Mandrakizay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ny ota maro izay natao
Tompo Ã´, mba avelao
O ! diovy ka sasao
Ny fonay re anjakao
Mba ho Anao
Dera, haja, saotra, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ny fiadananao izao
Ampombay ny olonao
Hampitony, hanavao
Ka hameno hatrizao
Ny fiainanay.
Dera, haja, saotra, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O ! ekeo ny vavakay
Sy ny saotra entinay
Ka ny voninahitra
Ho Anao maharitra
Mandrakizay.
Dera, haja, saotra, sns.
